greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle formed by reading A039599 mod 2.
comment: Also triangle formed by reading triangles A061554, A106180, A110519, A124574, A124576, A126953, A127543 modulo 2.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
formula: Sum_{k, 0<=k<=n}T(n,k)*Fibonacci(2*k+1)=A050614(n), see A000045 and A001519. - _Philippe Deléham_, Aug 30 2007
mathematica: T[0, 0] := 1; T[n_, k_] := Binomial[2*n - 1, n - k] - Binomial[2*n - 1, n - k - 2]; Table[Mod[T[n, k], 2], {n,0,10}, {k,0,n}] // Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 18 2017 *)
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 05 2007
